data.title: Foreigners
data.teaser:
Alone in a foreign land 3 people must come to terms with the bizarre customs of the locals along with questioning their own.
A comedy fockumentary looking at what people do in their everyday lives and how bizarre we really are as a species.
answers:
Es geht um ein Tv comedy pilot über menschen aus verschiedene länder die hier im Berlin leben.Wir sind alle ab und zu lustig weil wir seltsame ritualen haben.

A Tv comedy pilot about the weird and wonderful differences we share as people from different lands.Because sometimes you have to laugh at yourself.

Das wir uns als leute nicht so ernst nehmen und manchmal darüber lachen konnen.
Zielgruppe sind Leute die sich nicht so ernst nehmen und darüber lachen wollen.

Because sometimes we need to laugh at ourselves.
Target audience are people like you and me that dont take themselves too serious and can laugh about the
eccentricities we all have.

Das projeckt wird professional gedreht, Edited und präsentiert.

With the money we can shoot it professionally, edit it and present it to any fecker that will buy it..:).
